CustomField.description: This field is populated by a nightly batch process and represents the average score of client scorecards associated with this account which have a Completed Date this month (based on the Current Contract Calling Start Date, whichever is later)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is populated by a nightly batch process and represents the average score of client scorecards associated with this account which have a Completed Date this month (based on the Current Contract Calling Start Date, whichever is later)
CustomField.label: Client Scorecard Avg This Month
